field.label: Enable
field.help: This will activate the routing service.

field.label: Profile
field.help: Control FRR's default profile. "traditional" is the default, "datacenter" is more aggressive. Please refer to the FRR documentation for more information.

field.label: Enable CARP Failover
field.help: This will activate the routing service only on the master device.

field.label: Enable SNMP AgentX Support
field.help: This will activate support for Net-SNMP AgentX.

field.label: Enable logging
field.help: Syslog is a service which is made to collect log messages from different software and maybe to a central logging server. Check this box if you have such a setup.

field.label: Log Level
field.help: This is the detail level of the log. A higher level means more data is logged.

field.label: Firewall rules
field.help: Enable automatically created firewall rules, when additional policies are needed, disable this and define your own custom policies in the Firewall section.
